results.definition: a radioactive transuranic element synthesized by bombarding curium with carbon ions; 7 isotopes are known
referring to the degree to which a certain quality is present
examples: he was no heavier than a child
his no was loud and clear

results.definition: (quantifier) used with either mass nouns or plural count nouns for indicating a complete or almost complete lack or zero quantity of
examples: no eggs left and no money to buy any
I'll get you there in no time
